languages.text: "Необходимо избавить мир от ксенотеха, что порочит учение Бога-Машины и саму суть Его законов. Если позволите, мои сервиторы позже очистят это место".

traits.locale_text: "Необходимо избавить мир от ксено-теха, что порочит учение Бога-Машины и саму суть Его законов. Если позволите, мои сервиторы позже очистят это место".

languages.text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."
languages.original_text: "Необходимо избавить мир от ксенотеха, что порочит учение Бога-Машины и саму суть Его законов. Если позволите, мои сервиторы позже очистят это место".

traits.locale_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

"It is imperative that we rid the world of the xenotech that defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will cleanse this place later."

"It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

"It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

"It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

languages.text: 「機械神とその法のすべてに反するこの異星技術に満ちた惑星は、すぐにでも廃棄すべきです。陛下の許可が下れば、我のサーヴィターが後ほどこの場所を一掃します」
languages.original_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

traits.locale_text: 「機械神とその法のすべてに反するこの異星技術に満ちた惑星は、すぐにでも廃棄すべきです。陛下の許可が下れば、我のサーヴィターが後ほどこの場所を一掃します」

languages.text: «Es esencial purgar este mundo de la xenotecnología que viola las enseñanzas del Dios Máquina y la esencia de sus leyes. Con permiso, mis servidores purificarán este lugar más adelante».
languages.original_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

traits.locale_text: «Es esencial purgar este mundo de la xenotecnología que viola las enseñanzas del Dios Máquina y la esencia de sus leyes. Con permiso, mis servidores purificarán este lugar más adelante».

languages.text: “我们必须消灭这个世界上的一切异形科技。它们不仅违逆了万机之神的教诲，也有悖祂的法则本质。如果你同意，稍后我将派机仆过来，对这里进行一次彻底的清扫。”
languages.original_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

traits.locale_text: “我们必须消灭这个世界上的一切异形科技。它们不仅违逆了万机之神的教诲，也有悖祂的法则本质。如果你同意，稍后我将派奴工过来，对这里进行一次彻底的清扫。”

languages.text: « Nous devons à tout prix débarrasser ce monde de la xénotechnologie, car elle remet en question les enseignements du Dieu-Machine et l'essence même de Ses lois. Mes servitors se chargeront de purifier la zone, si vous m'en donnez l'autorisation. »
languages.original_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons à tout prix débarrasser ce monde de la xénotech, car elle remet en question les enseignements du Dieu-Machine et l'essence même de Ses lois. Mes servitors se chargeront de purifier la zone, si vous m'en donnez l'autorisation. »

languages.text: "Wir müssen diese Welt unbedingt von aller Xenotech befreien. Sie verstößt gegen die Lehren des Maschinengotts und die Essenz seiner Gesetze. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis werden meine Servitoren hier später alles säubern."
languages.original_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen diese Welt unbedingt von aller Xenotech befreien. Sie verstößt gegen die Lehren des Maschinengotts und die Essenz seiner Gesetze. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis werden meine Servitoren hier später alles säubern."

languages.text: "Bu dünyayı Makine Tanrı'nın öğretilerine ve kanunlarına karşı gelen zeno teknolojilerinden arındırmamız şart. İzninizle hizmetörlerim, daha sonra burayı arındıracak."
languages.original_text: "It is imperative that we rid this world of xenotech, which defies the teachings of the Machine God and the very essence of His laws. With your permission, my servitors will later cleanse this place."
